name: Jet Ski Turbo Boat:Speed Boat
description: In this Jet Ski Turbo Boat:Speed Boat game you can run your jet ski on the surface of water with a real jetsky play  experience. It's an amazing jet ski game with multiple jetski selection and multiple levels of jet game. This real jetski game have three modes while every mode is different. One mode is jetski racing mode, second one is for for the challengers like you have challenge mode having 10 levels and one mode is for game lovers and it is unlimited one. You can play this unlimited mode as much time as you want because this one have no time limit. Drive your jet ski into the sea to enjoy your jet ski simulation game. You can see beautiful sea islands. Enjoy this realistic jet sky driving experience. Collect the starts from the each level of this game using jet ski crazy stunts. Use fast jet sky to in the sea and river's surface. This jet ski gives you the freedom of ride using fast jet ski with crazy stunts. You have freedom of time and you can collect starts, diamonds and near miss points. When you become a professional then you have the option between challenge mode and time limited modes. This game have most exciting feature of multiplayer racing mode. You have to reach first among others opponents in this racing mode of jet ski game. This jet ski amazing game also gave you the experience of life guards in the beach of an amazing and stunning sea. You will feel beach danger during your ride along the beach side with a greater experience of jet ski.
